summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General memorandum documenting a voluntary interview of a Federal Bureau of Prisons Lieutenant regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in August 2019. The document references attachments including interview transcripts, warnings forms, and operational documents from the time of Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Deceased inmate at Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, Register Number 76318-054, whose death is the subject of the OIG investigation.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: BOP Lieutenant at MCC New York who was interviewed voluntarily by OIG agents regarding Epstein's death while in custody.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant as part of the OIG investigation into Epstein's death.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP Lieutenant alongside the Special Agent as part of the OIG investigation.

connections.description: Lieutenant was a BOP officer at MCC New York when Epstein was housed there, making him responsible for Epstein's custody and security.
Special Agent interviewed Lieutenant as part of the OIG investigation into Epstein's death.
Senior Special Agent interviewed Lieutenant alongside Special Agent as part of the OIG investigation.

events.title: Epstein's death in custody
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein died while housed at Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, leading to an OIG investigation.

events.title: OIG interview of BOP Lieutenant
events.description: Special Agent and Senior Special Agent conducted a voluntary recorded interview of a BOP Lieutenant regarding Epstein's death.

events.title: Epstein housed at MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was housed at Metropolitan Correctional Center New York in July and August 2019 prior to his death.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is part of an OIG investigation (Case Number: 2019-010614) into the death of Jeffrey Epstein while in BOP custody.
A BOP Lieutenant was interviewed on September 23, 2021, regarding Epstein's time at MCC New York in July and August 2019.
Attachments include operational documents from August 9, 2019 (the day Epstein died), such as daily assignment rosters, count documents, and pictures of Epstein's cell.
The document contains specific references to Epstein's inmate register number (76318-054) and mentions a 'Mandatory Epstein Rounds' sign in the Special Housing Unit.
The memorandum explicitly states it contains neither recommendations nor conclusions, indicating it is a factual record of the interview process.
